mapper.insert: INSERT INTO forum.board_attach (board_seq, board_type_seq, org_file_nm, save_path, chng_file_nm, file_size, file_type, reg_dtm) VALUES( #{boardSeq}, #{boardTypeSeq}, #{orgFileNm}, #{savePath}, #{chngFileNm}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM forum.board_attach WHERE board_seq=#{boardSeq} AND board_type_seq=#{boardTypeSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT attach_seq, board_seq, board_type_seq, org_file_nm, save_path, chng_file_nm, file_size, file_type, access_uri, download_cnt, reg_dtm FROM forum.board_attach WHERE attach_seq = #{attachSeq}
